messages.original:
Last night, a large-scale Russian Geran-2 drone attack was carried out on Kharkiv City. Most, if not all drones impacted.
The main target seems to be the Zalyutino 330 kV substation. Power outages were reported afterwards. Additionally, some form of industrial building was struck in the Shevchenkivskyi District.

Last night, a large-scale Russian Geran-2 drone attack was carried out on Kharkiv City. Most, if not all drones impacted.
The main target seems to be the Zalyutino 330 kV substation. Power outages were reported afterwards. Additionally, some form of industrial building was struck in the Shevchenkivskyi District.
Russian Geran-2 drones continue to strike Ukrainian energy infrastructure in Chernihiv Oblast. This video shows a strike on a substation near the city of Ichnya, which was hit by at least 4 drones.

A short time ago, Zaporizhzhia city came under attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. Several impacts were recorded in the city, as well as on the northern bank of the Dnipro River near the village of Bilenke. 
The attached videos are both from Zaporizhzhia City.

A short time ago, Zaporizhzhia city came under attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. Several impacts were recorded in the city, as well as on the northern bank of the Dnipro River near the village of Bilenke. 
The attached videos are both from Zaporizhzhia City.

A short time ago, Zaporizhzhia city came under attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. Several impacts were recorded in the city, as well as on the northern bank of the Dnipro River near the village of Bilenke.   The attached videos are both from Zaporizhzhia‚Ä¶
Large fires are now burning in Zaporizhzhia.
Large fires are now burning in Zaporizhzhia.
Large fires are now burning in Zaporizhzhia.

One of the targets hit by KAB glide-bombs in Zaporizhzhia City was the Omelchenko Machine-building plant.
This plant is/was used to produce airplane and helicopter engines, and other critical aviation parts for civilian and military use. It also produces power generating sets, and technological equipment. 
Coordinates: 47.82406, 35.00151

A rocket/missile was detected flying to Sumy from Kursk Oblast, and disappeared around the time of the explosion. There was also an Italmas drone flying low over the city at the time, so the explosion could have been from that.

A rocket/missile was detected flying to Sumy from Kursk Oblast, and disappeared around the time of the explosion. There was also an Italmas drone flying low over the city at the time, so the explosion could have been from that.
Local channels seem to believe that it was a drone, rather than a missile or rocket.

Ukrainian forces have recaptured the village of Dorozhnje, Dobropillya direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~96.
Total land area: ~0.58km¬≤.
Russian artillery shelling is now targeting Kherson, after the ballistic missile strike. A reconnaissance drone is operating there too.

Russian Army Advances On All Fronts In Kharkiv (Videos)
Kiev forces appear to be facing real difficulties in Khakriv, with reports from October 6 indicating advance by the Russian military on nearly all the fronts in this direction.
The Sever [North] Group of Forces has reportedly expanded its offensive operations in the forest of Synelnykove and on the left bank of the Volchya River in Volchansk. Heavy fighting is reported to be taking place in both areas, with Kiev forces attempting to hold onto every single position they have there. Still, Russian troops are making progress.
More advances were reported near Milove, to the southeast. The Russian Ministry of Defense confirmed that the Sever Group of Forces had taken over Odradne.
üëâ

China's Red Eye Over Ukraine: What Are The Middle Kingdom's Satellites Observing?
Russia's massive missile and drone attack on the Lviv region. Beijing's involvement in the targeting of Ukrainian military facilities. The hidden reason behind China's surveillance of Ukraine.
On 5 October, several Ukrainian news agencies reported an increase in the number of Chinese reconnaissance satellites flying over the Lviv region during a major air strike. At least three such satellites were recorded flying overhead. During the day, at least nine flights of Yaogan series satellites ‚Äî Yaogan 33, Yaogan 33-03 and Yaogan 33-04 ‚Äî were recorded in the area. These passed over Lviv between midnight and 11:30 a.m., with the Yaogan 34 optical satellite flying over at around 6 a.m.
Several Ukrainian and Western sources have claimed that Beijing and Moscow are sharing intelligence to improve the accuracy of strikes on territory controlled by Kyiv. But is this really the case?
üëâ
 Read more 
HERE

Ukraine Is Facing More Pressure Between Dobropillia And Dnepropetrovsk (Videos)
As of October 6, the Russian military continues to pressure Kiev forces from the Dobropillia salient and the city of Pokrovsk in the Donetsk direction to the directions of Dnepropetrovsk and Zaporozhye.
In the Dobropillia salient, the Tsentr [Center] Group of Forces has expanded its control in both Nykanorivka and Pankivka after repelling another wave of Ukrainian counterattacks. Russian troops also made gains near Shakhovo, advancing towards the settlement from the western direction.
Russian operations in the salient appear to be focused on clearing the two pockets held by Kiev forces, between Vladimirovka and Toretsk, as well as between Nykanorivka, Boikivka and Zatyshok. This will likely take time, as Ukrainian troops are fighting back.
üëâ

HERE

Military Situation In Yemen On October 6, 2025 (Map Update)

Ukrainian Reports Claim Russia Exported Su-35s To Ethiopia Amid Tensions With Egypt
Russia has signed a contract to export Sukhoi Su-35 4.5-generation air superiority fighter jets to Ethiopia, Ukrainian media reported on October 6, citing leaked documents allegedly from Russian state defense conglomerate Rostec.
The leaked documents, originally published online on October 3 by the hacker collective Black Mirror, which is supportive of the Kiev regime, outline detailed pricing, delivery schedules, and export plans for advanced Sukhoi fighter jets to several countries.
According to the leaked documents, Iran has ordered 48 Su-35 fighter jets, Algeria has purchased 12 Su-57 fifth-generation air superiority fighter jets in addition to 14 Su-34 fighter bombers, while Ethiopia has signed a contract for at least six Su-35s.
üëâ

Israel Killed Hezbollah Air Defense Commander, The Strike Exposed Serious Security Issues 
Israel on October 6 assassinated a senior commander of Hezbollah air defense array in a strike that exposed some of the serious security issues that the group continues to face.
The commander, Hassan Atwi, was killed alongside his wife, Zainab Raslan, in a drone strike targeting their car in Zebdine, on the outskirts of Nabatieh in southern Lebanon, the heartland of Hezbollah.
In a statement, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) said that Atwi was a ‚Äúsignificant source of knowledge‚Äù in Hezbollah, and led efforts to rebuild infrastructure and procure equipment for the air defense array. The military added that he also maintained contacts with Iranian officials who supplied Hezbollah with air defense systems.
üëâ
